Body.Content:
We are announcing the ability for makers and professional developers to test Power Apps with the test engine in Microsoft Dataverse. This feature will reach general availability on September 10, 2025.

How does this affect me?
The test engine can test canvas apps and model-driven apps from the Power Platform command-line tool or directly from the application. The test engine is open source, uses updated authentication that meets current requirements and supports AI feature testing and other capabilities.

Developers can integrate with Playwright to create tests in C#. You can find many samples and documentation in the test engine GitHub repo and in Microsoft Learn articles.

What action do I need to take?
This message is for awareness and no action is required.

Title: Microsoft Dataverse - Test Power Apps with the test engine
